title.rendered: E-Commerce Email Segmentation: Turning One-Time Buyers into Loyal Customers

content.rendered:
Join Clerk and Sleeknote in this webinar on e-commerce email segmentation. You’ll learn how to send the right emails to the right prospects through email segmentation and on-site messaging. We’ll also show you how to turn one-time buyers into loyal customers with intelligent product recommendations.

In This Webinar You Will Learn

Here’s a little summary of some of the subjects we cover in this webinar

  • How to target the right people with the right message through email segmentaion
  • How to turn one-time buyers into loyal customers with intelligent product recommendations
  • How to use personalization to get more orders
  • Which emails to send and when to send them to maximize profit
